data.name: Galaxy Girls - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC for the game Galaxy Girls includes two packages.

1. Music Player in Game


By purchasing and installing this DLC, the game will include a new feature on the main menu, that will allow you to change what music is currently playing to a different track. So you can play through the tracks from the game. All are available at the start once installed.

2. Complete Digital Soundtrack


In addition you will receive the complete digital soundtrack as mp3 music files for you to enjoy at your leisure outside of the game. A link to the music can be found inside the music player that will open the soundtrack directory. In addition Steam Music Player should also be able to access to the soundtrack.

The soundtrack includes 35 original tracks.
  • 1. Main Theme 1
  • 2. Casual 1
  • 3. Casual 2
  • 4. Happy 1
  • 5. Happy 2
  • 6. Tension 1
  • 7. Fight or Challenge
  • 8. Relaxed 1
  • 9. Relax 2
  • 10. Sexy Time 1
  • 11. Sexy Time 2
  • 12. Space Travel 1
  • 13. Space Travel 2
  • 14. Sad Scene
  • 15. Sad Scene 2
  • 16. Date in Space 1
  • 17. Date in Space 2
  • 18. Dangerous Encounter 1
  • 19. Dangerous Encounter 2
  • 20. Sexual Time 3
  • 21. Lighthearted Girl
  • 22. Dark Girl
  • 23. Cute Techno Girl
  • 24. Dark Zone
  • 25. Deep, Empty Space
  • 26. Melody Floating Across The Universe
  • 27. Solar Orchestra
  • 28. Chiming Stars - Intimate
  • 29. Intense Moment
  • 30. Stargazing (Hopeful)
  • 31. Vast Universe
  • 32. Upbeat Ending
  • 33. Sensational Spaceways
  • 34. Empty Space (Bad Ending)
  • 35. Main Theme - Piano


This DLC is included as part of the Deluxe Edition Bundle

data.short_description: This DLC grants players access to the music player within the game itself as well as the complete 35 track digital soundtrack to enjoy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
